definitions.definition: A student who is in the same class at school .
examples: Danny and I have been classmates for five years, but I've never spoken to him outside of lessons.

definitions.definition: A member of a different sort of class, such as locomotives etc.

main_definition: A student who is in the same class at school .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A member of a different sort of class, such as locomotives etc.
